name: spt-style
description: Meta package for ESLint settings for SPT

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config && npm run install:config-react
scripts.install:config: cd packages/eslint-config-spt && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config-react: cd packages/eslint-config-spt-react && npm prune && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:spt && npm run test:spt-react
